channel.title: Major glitches [PI]
channel.description:
in my server co-owners can spawn. there is also Player owned shops, this is obviously a problem people who are co owners can spawn and then put items in the shops for 1gp and ruin the eco... i have no idea how to stop people who are co-owner being able to sell or buy things from player owned shops.
second problem :
Summoning familliars can be used to store items. if said player is co-owner and they dissmiss there fammiliar there items are lootable. therefore ruining the eco again.
such simple things are so easily ruinable :S
any help appreciated even if its only the file names

item.title: Major glitches [PI]
item.dc:creator: @sex-scape_owner sex-scape owner
item.description:
@sex-scape_owner wrote:

[quote=“Ddragonimp, post:6, topic:417774”][quote author=sex-scape owner link=topic=520319.msg3778537#msg3778537 date=1318282728]

Then find co owners that are trust worthy.

even trustworthy people can have bad sides -.- one little idiotic argument shouldnt be the end of my server

its not that simple man i want the glitches fixed not some sort of trust system…
[/quote]

Why? are you selling Co-Owner or something why do you need to give away co-owner… give admin…
If they are co-owner and they are not trust worthy they shouldnt be co-owner.[/quote]

Read full topic

Then find co owners that are trust worthy.
[/quote]

its not that simple man i want the glitches fixed not some sort of trust system…[/quote]

Why? are you selling Co-Owner or something why do you need to give away co-owner… give admin…
If they are co-owner and they are not trust worthy they shouldnt be co-owner.

item.title: Major glitches [PI]
item.dc:creator: @sex-scape_owner sex-scape owner
item.description:
@sex-scape_owner wrote:

RiiPiiNFtW:

Simple. Dont make any more co owners. Make them admins with a yelltag.

not simple, i WANT co-owners.

Read full topic
